SLS Fixed Deposit

This is an investment account, where you deposit money for a fixed period of time and earn interest as high as 15 percent per annum. You can fix money for a minimum period of 30days to a maximum of 360 days

GET A LOAN NOW

SLS Save

This product is targeted towards achieving financial goals. You can open this account with amount as low as N5,000. Interest rate is 2% P.A above regular saving account. To open this account and save with us you would require one recent passport and a means of identification.

ONLINE BANKING

At Accelerex, you have the opportunity to send money to all Nigerian banks through our reliable online banking platform.

Retail & Enterprise Loans

Need a loan? Have no worries. At Accelerex microfinance Bank we provide instant loan services. Our loans are available for your personal, business use. Are you a public servant our Accelerex Stress free loan and Accelerex Salary Advance loan will meet your needs and obligations.

Likewise for those working in private establishments our Accelerex Salary Advance loan will also meet your needs.

Are you a business owner our Accelerex SME loan products will help you finance your business.

Accelerex STRESS FREE LOAN

ACCOUNT SERVICES

Our accounts are tailored to cover a wide range of customer’s financial needs from savings to current, corporate and hybrid accounts. This helps us to ensure no one is left out in financial inclusion.
